Description: Define the vision and high-level goals of the project
Create and prioritize the initial product backlog
Plan the releases and estimate the effort required
Plan the work for the upcoming sprint
Daily stand-up meeting to discuss progress and plan next steps
Develop and test the features planned for the sprint
Review the work completed during the sprint with stakeholders
Reflect on the past sprint and identify improvements
Review and refine the product backlog
Define the criteria for completing a feature or user story
Integrate code changes frequently to maintain a stable build
Ensure the software is always in a deployable state
Plan the release of the software to production
Execute the release plan and deploy the software
Review the release process and outcomes
Manage and resolve any incidents post-release
Collect feedback from users and stakeholders post-release
Update the product backlog based on feedback and new requirements
